member.name: MFCameraExtrinsics
member.summary: Describes the location of a camera relative to other cameras or an established external reference.

member.name: MFCameraExtrinsics.TransformCount
member.summary: The number of transforms in the CalibratedTransforms array.

member.name: MFCameraExtrinsics.CalibratedTransforms
member.summary: The array of transforms in the extrinsic data.
